subject: Re: [junit] Failed to invoke suite():java.lang.StackOverflowError
msgSnippet: ... I don t see the file so my answer may be totally wrong. One reason could be: public static Test suite() { TestSuite suite... return suite(); } instead of
messageBody:
> I am getting "Failed to invoke
> suite():java.lang.StackOverflowError"

> I am attaching the files for reference.

I don't see the file so my answer may be totally wrong.

One reason could be:

public static Test suite() {
TestSuite suite...

return suite();
}

instead of
return suite;

-Vladimir
